page.title: 13ST.PETER'S NORMAN CHURCH
page.content: {ST. Peter's Church}was mentioned in the{Domesday Book.}It was rebuilt in the 14th., and the 18th. centuries, but fell into disuse. In 1907 it was reopened and is now used regularly as part of the Thornaby Group Parish. The first recent wedding was held in 1984. The church members run many groups, including playgroups. In the 16th. century the church was given money to buy five lamps,though these have now disappeared. The Five Lamps, a gas lamp standard, became a meeting place in old Thornaby.
